FuncDef:
The description command configures the description for a candidate PCE server specified for a PCE client.
The undo description command deletes the description for a candidate PCE server specified for a PCE client.
By default, no candidate server description is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
PCE server description.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To help remember and manage candidate PCE servers, run the description command to describe each server. The description contains some characteristics of each candidate PCE server. For example, a description contains information about whether the server supports inter-domain path calculation or whether a server functions as a candidate for a specific client.
